Module org.example.proyecto
Package org.example.proyecto.model.user

Class UserDB

java.lang.Object
org.example.proyecto.model.user.UserDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAO
public class UserDB extends Object implements UserDAO
The UserDB class implements the UserDAO interface and provides methods to interact with user data in the database.

      getUsers in interface UserDAO

    • userLogin

      public UserDTO userLogin(String userEmail, String userPasswd) throws SQLException
      Performs user login authentication by verifying the provided email and password against the database.
      Specified by:
      userLogin in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      userEmail - The email address of the user trying to log in.
      userPasswd - The password of the user trying to log in.
      Returns:
      A UserDTO object representing the authenticated user if login is successful, or null if authentication fails.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • insertUser

      public boolean insertUser(UserDTO newUser) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new user into the database.
      Specified by:
      insertUser in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      newUser - A UserDTO object representing the user to be inserted.
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully inserted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(UserDTO deletedUser) throws SQLException
      Deletes a user from the database using its email address as identifier.
      Specified by:
      deleteUser in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      deletedUser - The user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

      Updates user information in the database.
      Specified by:
      updateUser in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      updatedUser - A UserDTO object representing the updated user information.
      Returns:

      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.
